pkgmetadata.longdescription: Instrumented Difference-in-Differences Decomposition // Implements a decomposition of the two-way fixed effects instrumental variable estimator into all possible Wald difference-in-differences estimators. Provides functions to summarize the contribution of different cohort comparisons to the overall two-way fixed effects instrumental variable estimate, with or without controls. The method is described in Miyaji (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2405.16467.
